name: Blaze & Bling
description:
How exactly does a dragon gather their hoard?

Some may come upon a nice mountain full of tasty dwarves already furnished with treasure, but most of us aren't so lucky.

Well, let's see... It must have something to do with burning cottages and slaying warriors. And don't forget the devouring of sheep. Generally terrorizing the countryside.

That must be it. After all, that's what dragons are good at.

Well then, what are you waiting for? It's time to gather a hoard of your own!

Controls

Best with an Xbox controller:

  • L-stick: for choosing direction while you fly and navigating the overworld
  • R-stick: navigate long bits of text
  • A: confirm/flame breath
  • B: cancel/dive

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • WASD arrows: for choosing direction while you fly and navigating the overworld
  • Mouse scroll wheel: navigate long bits of text
  • Left-click: confirm/flame breath
  • Right-click: dive
  • Esc: cancel

Keyboard Only:

  • Up/Down/Left/Right arrow keys: for choosing direction while you fly and navigating the overworld
  • Enter/Return: confirm
  • Esc: cancel
  • Left-CTRL: flame breath (confirm tutorial messages)
  • Left-ALT: dive
  • Sorry... you'll still need your mouse for a couple of things.
